abstract: Lynsey Addario photographed a maternity ward in a large New Delhi hospital on Monday, the day the world's seven billionth person was born. The photo essay comes alongside the start of a new project on Lens. What would you tell these babies about our world?

headline.main: From One Maternity Ward, a Growing World
